evidence.claim: SaluberMD uses AWS services for scalable infrastructure.
They integrate with HL7 and FHIR standards for healthcare data exchange.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations for data handling.
They utilize X12 EDI standards for transactions with clearinghouses.
Real-time data integration is supported through webhooks in their APIs.

icp.icp_reason: SaluberMD supports HIPAA X12 transactions, indicating alignment for API-first healthcare data exchange.
matched_use_cases: REST API integration for claims submissions
Webhooks for real-time updates on eligibility and claims
Support for X12 EDI transactions for payer-provider communication
